programme.title: Wildest Africa: Ngorongoro: Born of Fire
programme.desc: Ngorongoro is thought to have formed about 2.5 million years ago from a large volcano, whose cone collapsed inward after a major eruption. This fertile land is full of wildlife, from cunning hyena and proud lions to vast herds of wildebeest and elephants.

programme.title: Wildest Arctic: Arctic Ocean: The Frozen Sea
programme.desc: The film follows a year in the High Arctic, where life is exceptionally entwined with the seasons. Journey to the Arctic where in winter, the sun doesn't rise for months on end, but in the summer thaws out in an explosion of life.

programme.title: Wildest India: The Himalayas: Surviving the Summits
programme.desc: The Himalayas run across 2,500km of north India. he Himalayas' rugged highlands offer little direct refuge to humans, in the shadow below, over a billion people in India rely on the mountains for survival.

programme.title: Wildest India: Ganges: River of Life
programme.desc: Then watch, the longest river in India, The Ganges. It's a lifeline to wild animals, from rhinoceros and river dolphins to otters and gharials.

programme.title: Wildest Latin America: Amazon: One Jungle, Many Worlds
programme.desc: The Amazon is the largest rainforest in the world, and the richest ecosystem on earth. This film uncovers what makes the Amazon such a powerhouse of evolution; how it has come to home a third of all species on the planet.

programme.title: Don't Say A Word
programme.desc: When Dr. Nathan Conrad's daughter is kidnapped, a secret held by one of his catatonic patients may be his only hope.

programme.title: High Crimes
programme.desc: A woman's life becomes embroiled in a huge military cover-up when it's revealed her husband is not who he says he is.

programme.title: Secret Agent Super Dragon
programme.desc: A secret agent tries to stop a drug lord from taking over the world with hallucinogenic chewing gum.

programme.title: Blood Waters of Dr. Z
programme.desc: Seeking revenge against those responsible for stripping him of his tenure and the denial of human research subjects, Dr. Z mutates himself into a hideous and murderous half-human-half-fish-like creature!

programme.title: The Human Duplicators
programme.desc: An alien takes over a professor's mansion-basement laboratory, and makes android clones to infiltrate the government.

programme.title: King Dinosaur

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: A Score to Settle, Part 2
programme.desc: As the rematch between Kalin and Yusei continues, Yusei must find a way to out-think and out-maneuver the dark power of Kalin's Earthbound Immortal before it sends him to the Netherworld forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Destiny's Will, Part 1
programme.desc: Roman challenges Yusei to a Shadow Duel at the site of the original Ener-D Reactor. Meanwhile, Director Goodwin decides to make an unexpected visit to the Satellite Sector to settle some unfinished business he has with his Dark Signer brother.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Destiny's Will, Part 2
programme.desc: As the battle between Yusei and Roman rages on, Roman takes a time out to reveal the truth behind the original Ener-D Reactor's meltdown and the role Yusei's father played.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Shadows of Doubt, Part 1
programme.desc: Jack agrees to Turbo Duel Carly in an effort to defeat the darkness that has taken control of her. Can Jack rid the evil that has come to possess this one-time roving reporter?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Shadows of Doubt, Part 2
programme.desc: Jack kicks his duel into overdrive and summons his Red Dragon Archfiend in a desperate attempt to free Carly from the Dark Signers' control.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Signs of Doom, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Signs of Doom, Part 2
programme.desc: With the safety of the world hanging in the balance, Yusei, Jack and Crow look to tip the scales in their favor by setting their sights on Goodwin's Earthbound Immortal.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Signs of Doom, Part 3
programme.desc: With his life points running on empty, Yusei looks to rev it up one last time in order to defeat Goodwin and save the world from the destructive powers of the King of the Netherworld!

programme.title: The New Detectives: Hidden Obsessions
programme.desc: In San Diego, California, a killer has left behind pieces of evidence. Detectives must sort through these small clues to prove murder.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Double Helix

programme.title: The New Detectives: Trial Of The Century
programme.desc: Forensics in the O.J. Simpson Murder Trial: Millions watched on television as the jury rendered their verdict. Orenthal James Simpson was found not guilty of murder.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: On the restaurant's fifth night, Chef Gordon Ramsay has the contestants make and serve an entire Italian-themed menu.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Ian gets a call from a top Hollywood picture car coordinator and works his magic to get a vintage race car back in action.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Ian is commissioned to help build a wild, massive mobile floating party island for a prestigious festival in the Nevada desert (Burning Man).

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: A new client comes into the picture with a vintage desire; a hand-built motorcycle in the vein of early Harley Davidsons, but with a Full Custom twist. And later, Ian pushes the envelope with a cool electric bike build for himself.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: An old client brings in Ian to build a classic 54 Chevy pickup truck from the ground up with some major custom upgrades.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: One of Ians most infamous show cars, Space Junkie, comes back to into the shop in a bizarre turn of events. The gem is in desperate need of rehab and Ian brings it back to life, better than ever, with some major reworking!

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel delivers the fabrication goods as he transplants an old 1948' cab onto a modern roll-off truck and creates one bad-ass trash truck.

programme.title: Andromeda: The Devil Take the Hindmost
programme.desc: Dylan and Rev Bem help a peaceful society to stand up to their would-be slavers. They have to be careful because if Dylan teaches them to kill, their kids will be born knowing it.

programme.title: Andromeda: The Honey Offering
programme.desc: Dylan attempts to bring peace to two different Nietzschean prides by escorting the princess of one to her arranged marriage to the prince of the other.

programme.title: Andromeda: Star-Crossed
programme.desc: Rommie's avatar falls in love with what turns out to be the avatar of a warship named Gabriel. Gabriel attempts to infect Rommie with a virus that broadcasts its plans to the warship.

programme.title: Andromeda: It Makes a Lovely Light
programme.desc: Beka takes the Andromeda to Tarn-Vedra, but extended time in the slipstream causes side effects. To combat them, Beka starts taking Flash and soon becomes addicted.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: An old memory from the Andromeda is accidentally activated, which sends her on a mission and leaves Dylan and the crew unable to override the command.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Little Boy Lost
programme.desc: In 1957, nine-year-old Peter Boland was on holiday having the time of his life on a remote farm in New Zealand when he simply vanished without a trace. Peters older brother Gavin Boland, a self-confessed sceptic, turns to Sensing Murders psychics.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Now You See Me
programme.desc: 26-year-old deaf woman Alexa Cullen vanished from her home in Manaia, on the Coromandel Peninsular in 1995. She had a history of hitch-hiking and police suspected shed run away. But three years later, ominous rumors began circulating in the community.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Vanishing Point
programme.desc: In 2003, 32-year-old mother of three Sara Neithe vanished from the Hauraki Plains. Neither Sara nor her car have been seen since. Police suspect that Sara has been murdered but without a crime scene, they have been unable to advance the case.

programme.title: Sensing Murder
programme.desc: Sensing Murder psychics are challenged to connect with the spirit of murdered Christchurch scrap-metal dealer, John Reynolds, to discover his killer and reveal the truth surrounding the violent attack.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Death in a Heartbeat / The Body in the Bag
programme.desc: CI examines the Dr. Victor Chang extortion murder as well as the horrific Jane Doe Case where a girl is found lying on the side of the road of an inner Sydney suburb wrapped in two plastic garbage bags.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: No Mercy: The Killing of Virginia Morse
programme.desc: The horrific story of killers Allan Baker and Kevin Crump who began their murderous spree in rural NSW by killing a complete stranger for $20, a packet of cigarettes and a couple of litres of petrol.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Hunt for a Killer: The Claremont Murders
programme.desc: This chilling CIA episode details the long and difficult investigation which began with the disappearance of 18-year-old secretary Sarah Spiers from a night club in the up-market Perth suburb of Claremont on Australia Day 1996.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Kid for Ransom / Tears for Daniel
programme.desc: We examine two notorious abduction cases. The first case is the Graeme Thorne ransom kidnapping at Bondi in 1960. Thorne, aged eight, was the son of winners of the Sydney Opera House Lottery.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Assassination of John Newman
programme.desc: John Paul Newman was a member of the New South Wales state parliament and a member of the seat of Cabramatta.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Stevies daughter Rose (Basia Ahern) turns up at Drovers unexpectedly. Shes run away from her Mum to live with her Aunty Stevie.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: The weekend of Stevie and Alexs rodeo school has finally arrived and they are excited with the prospect of turning their fresh faced students into rodeo stars.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: A minor car accident at the truckstop brings Stevie and Kane Morgan (Craig McLachlan) together for the first time. Stevie, at fault, is smitten by this handsome stranger when he tells her not to worry about the damage to his car.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: On a stiflingly hot summer morning, Tess bakes a batch of bread using organic rye flour she bought from one of the members of her organics group. Its also her Saturn birthday and she laments to Stevie that she hasnt achieved any of her goals.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Kanes relationship with Stevie and Alex strains their friendship.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: PJs Pets is one of the nations oldest pet store chains, but the company has a new President in place, and shes determined to rattle a few cages. Margaret Kordas steps out of her stilettos when she spends a week working in her own stores.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Catherine Monson is the driving force behind Fastsigns which is Americas largest custom sign franchise company. During her journey, Catherine finds out its really the personal discoveries that make this experience a life-changing one.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Dan Dizio is the CEO of the fastest growing pretzel bakery on the East Coast, Philly Pretzel Factory. Dan goes undercover as Michael Downs, a data entry processor who will be switching jobs with Philly Pretzel employees.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Kristen Flynn, the boss of Premiere Van Lines. Shes a woman with a formidable reputation. Her own staff call her Frugal Flynn because she watches the pennies to protect profit.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Silva became CEO of Checkers & Rallys fast food restaurants five years ago, and immediately focused on growing the business at any cost. So he is going undercover to find even more ways to drive sales and please his guests.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: True Identity
programme.desc: Dog knows that looks can be deceiving. The fugitive is pretty, petite, and trouble. She stands accused of settling an argument with the help of a box cutter. What Dog does not anticipate is how deceptive this femme fatale can truly be!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Secrets and Lies
programme.desc: What do you do when you have a fugitive you not only want to find, but believe can be helped back onto the straight and narrow? If you're Mary Ellen you call your good friend Dog.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Match Point
programme.desc: Duty calls and the Chapmans are off on a hunt. The team chases a fugitive who has disappeared into a world of "no known addresses."

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Menehune Mischief
programme.desc: When Beth returns to the compound on the Big Island she finds a damaged SUV and two possible culprits - Dog or Justin. Pressed by Beth, Dog offers a third option. The perpetrators are Hawaii's mythical mischief makers - the Menehune!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mister Mom
programme.desc: It's been quite a while since Tim Chapman put down his mace can and bulletproof vest to care for his growing family. When his old friend Dog calls asking for help tracking an elusive felon, Tim jumps into action.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bait & Snitch
programme.desc: With the aid of the runner's girlfriend the posse heads out to bring a client with a checked past in. Little does the team suspect that before the end of the day Dog will be helping to mend a family torn apart by violence.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Scared Straight
programme.desc: Dog tracks a fugitive who is on the run from the law for the first time. Reading the file Dog knows the young man's life is at the crossroads. Will he be able to track down this wanna-be-gangsta in time to convince him to make the right choice?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: All My Children
programme.desc: For a guy who started life as a free spirited outlaw-biker Dog has certainly turned into a family man. His children touch everything he does today, from searching for the perfect gift for his daughter Cecily's birthday to hunting a fugitive.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Welcome to the Jungle
programme.desc: The hunt for an elusive and clever criminal takes Dog through the world of a bantam fighting cock, a pregnant daughter, and a jungle safe house go together. And don't forget the mopeds as well as a group of hostile squatters on government land!

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Friday Afternoon Lights
programme.desc: When Willie becomes an assistant coach on Lil' Will's struggling football team, his authority is tested when the kids challenge the adults to a scrimmage. Meanwhile, Kay brings Jep and Si to an aquarobics class at a local health club.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Master and Duck Commander
programme.desc: When Jase and the guys transform an old pontoon boat into a floating duck blind, they are faced with the impending question of whether or not it will actually float. Meanwhile, Kay's dog Bobo misbehaves.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Inlawful Entry
programme.desc: When Missy's parents visit, her father convinces Jase to take him on a quail hunt. But while their "bonding hunt" yields very few quail, it does bring them closer together as friends. Meanwhile, Willie helps John Luke start his own snow cone business.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Flock and Key
programme.desc: Si recruits his nephews to help him transport a storage container to his backyard, but things take a turn when Jep becomes locked inside the box. Meanwhile, Jase helps Mia prepare for her cheerleading competition, but the only problem is he has no idea.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Ball in the Family
programme.desc: When Willie's old rival Phillip McMillan challenges him to a game of dodgeball, Willie recruits his family members to settle a score once and for all. Meanwhile, Si thinks his cat is cheating on him with another family, so he recruits Miss Kay.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Drone Survivor
programme.desc: When Jase and Phil make a bet about whether or not human beings in a duck blind are visible from the air, Jep buys a drone copter to get a "bird's eye" view, but ends up losing it in the process.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Alan in Charge
programme.desc: Jase and the guys convince Willie to hire his older brother Alan to work at Duck Commander, but when Alan begins micromanaging everyone, they quickly change their mind. Meanwhile, the ladies take a self-defense class and use John Luke as a punching bag.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Renaissance Men
programme.desc: When the Robertsons throw a Renaissance Fair birthday party for Godwin, various family members compete in a tournament to win knighthood.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Heroes Welcome
programme.desc: In this special episode, the Duck Commander team surprises two wounded veterans with a trip to Monroe so they can be in an episode of Duck Dynasty. To show their support, the Robertson family stages a color run to bring awareness to our wounded soldiers.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Pie Hard
programme.desc: Willie and Alan agree to help Miss Kay open her own bakery, but things take a turn when Kay is asked to hand over her secret recipes. Meanwhile, the guys in the duck call room take an extended lunch break by driving to Mississippi.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Van He'llsing
programme.desc: When Missy and Jase's son Reed purchases an old van to boost his music career, his parents begin to question some of his choices. Meanwhile, Willie helps Jep prepare River for a competitive wrestling league by introducing him to his friend.

programme.title: Drug Wars: Episode 5
programme.desc: DEA agents in St Louis tackle a growing heroin epidemic, one dealer at a time. And St Louis law enforcement pulls out every stop to reverse the citys culture of drugs

programme.title: Drug Wars: Episode 6
programme.desc: St Louis DEA expands its investigation into a suspected heroin dealer who has so far dodged them at every turn. And as a heroin epidemic hits America, young addicts in St Louis embark on the battle of their lives to break their addiction

programme.title: Drug Wars: Episode 7
programme.desc: Five Dollar Insanity hits South Florida, as law enforcement battles Flakka, a dangerous new synthetic drug that has invaded the streets.Cody, a St Louis heroin addict struggling to break his addiction, must summon the courage to travel to Florida

programme.title: Drug Wars: Episode 8
programme.desc: The Falfurrias checkpoint in South Texas cracks down on drug and human traffickers. Their inspections are so effective that they often force migrants and drug smugglers to hike forty miles around the checkpoint to avoid detection

programme.title: Drug Wars: Episode 9
programme.desc: Broward County law enforcement and fire rescue tackle a daily onslaught of cases tied to the dangerous new synthetic drug Flakka . And a Ft Lauderdale Flakka addict named Glenn undertakes what may be his last chance at recovery.

programme.title: Drug Wars: Episode 10
programme.desc: When night falls on the Rio Grande comes to life with drug smugglers. Border Patrol counters by dispatching highly-trained Special Operations units, with agents drawn from the elite tactical unit BORTAC and the Mobile Response Team (MRT).

programme.title: Timber Kings: The Getaway
programme.desc: As winter approaches, the rush to build two summer getaway homes is on. Peter leads his team in Alberta while Bryan Jr. and his guys head north to Alaska.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Great Expectations
programme.desc: In upstate New York, Beat builds three grandiose gazebos for two brothers with neighbouring properties. Back home, Bryan Jr. asks his son Little Man to take charge of his first build ever.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Pour Up Drank
programme.desc: Floyd Stevens jealousy is leading Alqueisha Quey Benjamin to consider breaking it off. Quey is becoming an alcoholic because of his controlling ways, but Floyd has caught her in a few lies and suspects her of cheating!

programme.title: Divorce Court: Angry Woman
programme.desc: Rechene Hall and Itarous Parker have been together for over 4 years and are engaged, but Rechene doesnt trust Itarous because of his lying. Itarous claims Rechene is too immature for a relationship. Is this couple headed down the break-up aisle?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Dead Weight
programme.desc: They say opposites attract, but Betty is starting to feel weighed down by David. David is lazy and disrespectful for how broke he is all the time. Betty no longer wants to be tied down by being with someone who is always unemployed and lies about it.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Stir Crazy
programme.desc: America says that Nathaniels controlling ways has taken the relationship to the point of no return. Nathaniel says shes always flirting with other men and even coming home with a hickies.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Young Love
programme.desc: Anissa and Malik have been together for 9 years and they have endured a lot of heartache due to Maliks cheating and dishonesty. Malik says hes not the same man he used to be and hes trying to keep his family together..

programme.title: Divorce Court: In and Out
programme.desc: Willard says hes getting tired of this roller coaster ride of a relationship with Cynthia and hes had just about as much as he can take with her lies and deception.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Drank Sinatra
programme.desc: Kayla's excessive drinking along with the cheating is a deal breaker from Bryan. Bryan can no longer tolerate Kayla's alcohol-fueled tantrums. She says he is controlling and doesn't put her and her child first. Can Judge Toler save this couple?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Not Man Enough
programme.desc: No matter how hard Demont tries, he's always looking up at the bar Reasha keeps raising. Demont got a promotion and relocated for work, which raised her suspicions of him cheating. Can this couple ignite the spark or is this relationship totaled?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Hot Girl Summer
programme.desc: Shortly after tying the knot Diana gave Robert an ultimatum: they'd either have an open relationship or she was gone. He wants to save the marriage, but she isn't ready to compromise. Can Diana finally settle with one man, or is this really the end?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Stay with Me Part 1
programme.desc: Johnnie says she suspects Henri of cheating now because he acts indifferent and doesnt come home most nights. Henri points the finger back claiming Johnnie's not only a cheater, but also enables her family members and has developed a gambling habit.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Stay with Me Part 2
programme.desc: Johnnie says she suspects Henri of cheating now because he acts indifferent and doesnt come home most nights. Henri points the finger back claiming Johnnie's not only a cheater, but also enables her family members and has developed a gambling habit.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Age Ain't Nothin but a Number
programme.desc: Kelley feels Keionte's childish behavior has her considering burning their marriage license. He claims that once they married, Mommie Dearest was born and no longer wants to be her business partner! Can they figure it out before it's too late?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Inside Out
programme.desc: Dog kickstarts the search for Jackson, a 240lbs, six feet tall bad boy who has skipped out on a $10,000 bond. Jacksons apparently at his father-in-law's house, but the father-in-law has info about Jackson that brings Dog to a unique hideout.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Family Drama
programme.desc: First, Lou, Froy, and Matt team up with Eva, an alluring lending agent, who sets up a sting to repo a limousine from its delinquent owner.

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Road to Recovery
programme.desc: On this premiere of Operation Repo's brand new season, Sonia's rehabilitation from her gunshot wound takes a shocking turn. The whole team runs into trouble on a job when they attempt to repossess a carnival ride from a group of wannabe carnies.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Warzone at the Worksite
programme.desc: Ronnie's gotten a raise and a promotion, and Carlos's jealousy sends him looking for more appreciation. But when his quest for glory goes wrong, will it turn the entire team against him? Matt and Sonia wrangle with a small business owner.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Broken Bones and Broken Phones
programme.desc: First, Froy, Lou, and Matt wrestle a group of bodybuilders when going after a Jeep Commander. Next, an unemployed stockbroker gets a rude awakening when Lou and Lyndah wake him up inside his car.

programme.title: Operation Repo: High and Low Spirits
programme.desc: First, Lou and Froy tail an upper class debtor to an upscale restaurant where the food is almost as unpalatable as its clientele's attitude. Then, Lyndah and Froy head to a residential district to repossess a van that is busy being loaded up with stolen e

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: You Snooze, You Lose
programme.desc: Beth designs a luxurious new office for the team and shows it off to Dog, but the bounty hunter is more interested in starting his hunt for Federico, who's been revoked for missing court dates and generally running amuck.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Judgment Day
programme.desc: Dog goes on his a case, which involves Bobby, who's been on parole for three months pending sentencing on an assault charge. Bobby's girlfriend wants him back in jail, and Dog agrees that the Bobby needs to be behind bars.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Set-Up
programme.desc: The trail is hot and the stakes is high for Dog and the posse. The "Big Fish" in this case is Marco, an alleged drug dealer with a big bond. But a major key to catching him is Elizabeth, who is also a fugitive from the law.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Nearshore Islands
programme.desc: Some of the worlds greatest islands are so close that they blend in with the mainland. But regardless of their size and origins, they are often the islands we are drawn to the most, each forging their own unique identity.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Cruises
programme.desc: There is something seductive about setting sail. Cruises offer us a chance to dip our toes into the 70% of our planet awash with oceans, rivers, and lakes, exploring places that can only be reached by daring to leave the shore.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Forest Animals
programme.desc: Forest Animals gets up close with bears, koalas, moose, wolves, weaver ants, and Tasmanian Devils. This episode roves dark forests floors and soars above vast canopies of green in America, China, Laos, and Australia.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Deserts
programme.desc: For all their reputation as inhospitable places, deserts are full of incredible plants and animals that have adapted to the climate. They are bursting with geological wonders that inspire and are home to some of the most life in the world.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Remote Cities
programme.desc: Brave the frontiers of the worlds most remote cities. More than distant trading posts and isolated regional hubs, cities like Alice Springs, Jaipur and even Las Vegas serve as gateways to the wild places of the Earth.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur's Eyes/Francine's Bad Hair Day
programme.desc: For some reason, Arthur isn't doing very well in school anymore. Maybe he just needs some glasses? Problem is, Arthur hates having to wear them. And it's school picture day and Muffy is determined that Francine will look her best.

programme.title: Arthur: Best Wishes/The Tardy Tumbler
programme.desc: After George has a lucky streak, his friends pressure him to wish for a snow day. Can George deliver? Prunella's excited about making the gymnastics team, until she realizes practice starts at 6am! Will she practice or snooze?

programme.title: Arthur: Flea to Be You and Me/Kiss and Tell
programme.desc: Pal is itching like crazy and the culprit is Pepe, an Italian circus flea. Then, Emily returns from her summer in Paris with the amazing news that she's been kissed .... by a boy! Now can D.W. find her own Prince Charming?

programme.title: Arthur: So Long, Spanky/Buster's New Friend
programme.desc: D.W.'s beloved bird gets very sick, and despite D.W.'s eager ministrations, Spanky dies. Can she risk giving her heart to another pet? Then, Buster doesn't have time for Arthur. And all he wants to talk about is a new friend named Mike.

programme.title: Arthur: Baseball Blues/Brain's Biggest Blunder
programme.desc: It's Grebelings season and George can't wait to play! After all, no one knows more about baseball than George. Then, wBrain gets teamed with Buster and Binky in the annual Arithmattack competition.

programme.title: Arthur: Silent Treatment/Kung Fool
programme.desc: When shy George wonders if any of his friends notice him, he decides he wont speak to anyone until they do! Fern volunteers to help an elderly neighbor with his household chores, and then discovers his past life as a Kung Fu celebrity.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur's Treasure Hunt/The Return Of The King
programme.desc: When Buster digs up an ancient arrowhead, everyone else wants to hunt for buried treasures, too. And a field trip to the Medieval Fair pits Arthur's class against another led by Ratburn's super-tough mentor, Mr. Pryce-Jones.

programme.title: Arthur: Tales of Grotesquely Grim Bunny/Pet Projects
programme.desc: When the comic book store changes owners, the new darker comics are right up Fern's alley, but Arthur can't seem to stomach them. Arthur and Francine enter their pets to compete against each other in the "Perfect Pet" video contest.

programme.title: Arthur: D.W. on Ice/Spoiled Rotten!
programme.desc: D.W. tells her friends that she's a fantastic skater, but she can barely stand on ice! With a skating party coming up, how will she face everyone and tell them the truth? Accused of being spoiled, Muffy sets out to prove her friends wrong.

programme.title: World War II in HD Color
programme.desc: Allies turn the tide in the Atlantic, where initially German U-Boats harass freely convoys to supply Britain. The route to bring American soldiers who will land on D-Day is clear.

programme.title: World War II in HD Color
programme.desc: Their attack on the Soviet Union having failed, the German Army suffers a series of counter-offensives on the Eastern Front. Wehrmacht's losses are huge as the Soviets advance West.

programme.title: World War II in HD Color
programme.desc: After a careful campaign of disinformation that throws the German defenders off-guard, the Western Allies finally land on Normandy.France is liberated.

programme.title: World War II in HD Color
programme.desc: The Western Allies secure supply routes that will allow them to enter Germany, and the Ardennes counter-offensive fails. The Red Army advances rapidly. The SS implements the Holocaust.

programme.title: World War II in HD Color
programme.desc: The Marines succeed in the "island hopping" strategy against suicidal resistance. The US Navy establishes supremacy, cutting off Japan.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Alante has spent the last 8 years planning a life with his online love Nevaeh. She's perfect but her disappearances have Alante worried. Nev and Max help to uncover a mysterious truth that affects Alante's entire town.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: John & Kelsey
programme.desc: John is ready to leave Detroit but one thing holds him back: Kelsey. The two have never spoken outside of online chats but John is sure she's the one. Can he include Kelsey in his plans? (S3, ep6)

programme.desc: Julie and Oobah uncover more than they were expecting, as their search to help Emma find her online love Harlin takes a sinister turn. (S1, ep1)

programme.desc: Joanna was about to meet her online love in the flesh, but a crazy night in Vegas caused the whole relationship to go sour. Now she's enlisted Nev to help track down her former flame. (S5, ep8)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Jamey and Ari
programme.desc: Jamey fell for Ari online, and he will do anything to meet her, but she will only do it on TV! Nev and Max help Ari share her story, and she hopes Jamey will accept her as she is. (S4, ep8)

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Once More Unto the Beach

programme.title: 48 Hours: Walking Free

programme.title: 48 Hours: Buried Secrets of Las Vegas

programme.title: 48 Hours: Sweetheart Murders

programme.title: 48 Hours: Bitter Pill

programme.title: 48 Hours: A Brother's Mission
programme.desc: A report on the 2007 death of Karl Hoerig, a decorated military pilot from Ohio and his brothers mission to track down and bring to justice the accused killer.

programme.desc: Pam Goody is running out of money to complete the Arts Centre renovations and Molly suggests holding a fashion show to raise funds. Pam thinks this a wonderful idea and asks Molly to organise it. Bob is, of course, just the man to build a catwalk.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: When Scrambler tells Spud that Bob is putting together the machinery for Farmer Pickles sunflower oil factory, he decides that putting things together is something hed be very good at. So he heads off to the factory to lend a hand.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob is building a lean-to for Mr Beasleys allotment. Wendy offers to pick up the materials from JJs yard, while Bob makes a start on the cement floor. But before he can leave, Bob gets a call from Mr Dixon, who needs a hole in his roof fixed urgently.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Scoop is keen to enter the towns snowman competition, but a burst pipe outside Mr Sabatinis needs fixing. Scoop is anxious when he sees the snowman that Mr Sabatini has made for the competition.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: The team are building Sunflower Valleys first geodesic dome. As Wendy has organised the dome and knows how it all fits together, Bob suggests that she might like to take charge of the job. Reluctantly Wendy agrees.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and the gang are building a pedestrian crossing. Mrs Percival, meanwhile, has asked Molly to paint a mural of a jungle scene in the school playground.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and the team are installing a bull-rush water recycling system to clean water from Farmer Pickles cottage. The clean water will be used to water Farmer Pickles new orchard. Bob explains that everything needs to be built in order its a process.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: The Team are converting Mr Sabatinis windmill into a caf. Roley is rolling the ground flat for all the tables and chairs while Bob makes the awnings. Roley hits trouble when molehills keep appearing where hes just been rolling.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Mr Sabatini has decided to move from Bobsville to set up the Sunflower Valley bakery. Bob and the team are going to build him a new house close to the river. Muck asks if Spud can tag along as hes been telling him exciting stories.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and the gang leave to convert a house into two separate flats. Mr Bentley, meanwhile, has been left in charge of The Mayors dog.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob is building a marshland walkway with his Dads help. Benny hears that the marsh is like a jungle and becomes determined to finds some jungle animals like tigers. Every time he spots one, however, it turns out to be something very ordinary.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob is repairing a leaking water tank at the school, when he discovers bats in the belfry. He tapes up the tank temporarily, but says the bats will need a new home as they are a protected species.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob has promised to put a cat flap in his kitchen door for Pilchard, but he gets an urgent call from Farmer Pickles who needs a fence built to keep the rabbits out of his lettuce field.

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Its the teams first full day in Sunflower Valley and the machines are all a bit nervous of the mammoth job ahead. All except for Muck who is determined to show that hes not a bit worried. Travis arrives with Bobs new mobile home.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: The whole town is practicing for an egg and spoon race, which Mrs Percival has organised. Trix decides to enter, but unfortunately she practices with fresh eggs and in her usual haste she manages to make a great mess in JJs yard.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob has a day off and he takes a trip to Farmer Pickles farm to take some photographs for the town photography competition. Wendy, meanwhile, has been called to the school hall where a pipe has burst, threatening the competition.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob is installing an antique fireplace for Mrs Percival. He goes to JJs yard to collect it and finds JJ playing with his new model aeroplane. Bob then heads to Mrs Percivals and starts to knock out the old fireplace.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Lee Rigby
programme.desc: In broad daylight on a busy Woolwich street on 22nd May 2013, serving soldier Fusilier Lee Rigby was attacked and murdered by Islamic extremists Michael Adebolajo and Michael Adebowale.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Rolf Harris
programme.desc: Rolf Harris became famous for his artwork and music, even painting a portrait of the Queen for the jubilee. But it all came crumbling down in August 2013 when he was accused of 12 assaults on girls as young as eight years old between 1968 and 1986.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Angus Sinclair
programme.desc: Angus Sinclair, called Scotland's worst serial killer, is linked to the 1977 murders of two girls in Edinburgh.
